OrgName.entry: EARL MARSHALL CONNEXIONS CENTRE - YOUTH CLUB

Desc.entry: Club for young people aged 13-19 years, run by Sheffield Futures (see separate entry). Provides the opportunity to get involved in lots of different activities and groups, as well as a place to relax and socialise. Offers support and advice from trained staff about a wide range of issues. Enables young people to make a positive impact upon their community and have their say on issues that matter to them.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Fri 6-9pm (Youth Club 13-19 years), please contact for additional programme details
